name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Automation Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing and implementing automated testing solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Java** and **Python**, leveraging tools such as **Selenium**, **Cypress**, **Postman**, **JMeter**, and **REST-assured** to ensure the reliability and performance of applications. Experienced in CI/CD processes and using platforms like **Bamboo** and **Jira** for seamless workflow management. Adept at working with databases such as **MySQL** and leveraging monitoring tools like **Splunk** and **Datadog** to optimize application performance.

Possessing a strong background in **full-stack development** and modern frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, I have delivered enterprise-grade platforms with integrated AI/ML capabilities for advanced analytics. My expertise in implementing **microservices architecture**, event-driven systems, and compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, combined with hands-on experience in developing efficient **MLOps workflows** and deploying machine learning models using tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**, ensures the delivery of robust and secure applications.
